subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Monta Ellis scored 5 of his 27 points in overtime, and the Milwaukee Bucks beat the Celtics in Boston, 99-94, in the teams’ last scheduled meeting of the season.
snippet: Monta Ellis scored 5 of his 27 points in overtime, and the Milwaukee Bucks beat the Celtics in Boston, 99-94, in the teams’ last scheduled meeting of the season.
